label: A2BC4_hR42_167_f_ac_2f-001
title: $\beta$-BaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$ (High Temperature) Structure
comments:
This is the high-temperature structure of BaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$.  Cooling to temperatures between 100-400$^\circ$C it transforms into \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4_hR42_161_2b_b_4b-001}{$\alpha$-BaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$}. The principle difference between the two forms is the lack of inversion symmetry in the low-temperature structure. 
 This structure was determined by cooling liquid BaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$ to room temperature.
